transcript:
Customer: Select verification bola ja raha hai tumne bata nahi paya tha.
Kaha bataya tha ek ek NR bol rahi hai.
Ek beech mein keh rahi hai NR NR.
Hello.
Hello.
Hello.
Executive: Haan sir good afternoon.
Customer: Good morning ji kaun?
Executive: Haan Vivek Singh baat kar raha hu IndiaMART office se aapne na customer care call helpline pe call kiya tha sir. To abhi baat hui aapke account manager se aapki.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Ji ji ji to aapne jis purpose ke liye call kiya tha wo follow ho gaya sir resolve ho gaya.
Customer: Abhi nahi hua resolve wo.
Executive: Achcha kya dikkat aa rahi thi sir wo bank detail wala.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji haan ji wo abhi tak nahi.
Executive: To bank detail matlab kya matlab dikkat aa rahi hai update kar dijiye bank detail kya dikkat hai bank detail update karne mein.
Customer: Main to nahi chah raha bank detail update karna koi pareshani nahi hai isme koi mandatory thodi na hai.
Executive: Kya keh rahe hai sir?
Customer: Matlab main nahi chah raha ki main apni personal bank detail kisi ko share karu mandatory thodi na hai.
Executive: Magar agar man lijiye agar sir kisi customer ko agar account wagera dete honge aap transfer karne ke liye koi apne employer ko to account detail to share karte hi honge na sir.
Customer: IndiaMART pe nahi karani nahi karani nahi karani.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Isme to isme to koi isme to koi dikkat nahi hai actually aap sirf aapka nahi pata hota hai update hota hai.
Customer: Koi baat nahi main nahi ja raha koi pareshani hai bata do mujhe.
Executive: Haan. Koi pareshani hai isme ye bataiye aap.
Customer: Nahi nahi pareshani dikkat ye hai ki wo bank.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi ja raha main aap use rehne dijiye.
Executive: Haan haan haan nahi karana hai.
Customer: Haan nahi karana bank detail update nahi karna hai push kar do aap isko.
Executive: Arey sir achcha reason kya hai aap ye to bata dijiye bank detail hi to hai nahi karana nahi karana company ka owner jo mana kar de to main kya kar sakta hu.
Executive: Achcha owner mana kar rahe hai.
Customer: Haan haan to usme main thodi na kuch kar sakta hu sir main to employee hu aapki tarah hi hu.
Executive: Achcha achcha. Ab main unko bolunga wo mujhe thodi mujhe kya dikkat hai.
Executive: Suniye suniye aap jaise aap ho abhi. Aapka owner kisi ke isliye aap se mana kar de IndiaMART ke to aap kya karoge.
Executive: Haan wo to sahi hai baat to sahi hai.
Customer: Aap dono ek hi page pe hai. Main jo aapne bola unse bhi main ye sawal puch leta hu kya aap kyun nahi kara rahe reason to wo to fayda hai nahi kara rahe baat khatam ho gayi bas ab wo thodi na kyun nahi kara rahe.
Executive: Waise isme waise isme jaise man lijiye koi dikkat to hai nahi man lijiye hamare agar IndiaMART ke through agar buyer bhi milte hai aapko.
Customer: Main aapki baat man gaya lekin jab owner hi mana kar raha hai to batao main kya kar sakta hu mera personal dal do aap mujhe de do apna account number wo dal do aap aur batao.
Executive: Haan. Aisa ho sakta hai mera personal dal dijiye phir.
Executive: Personal dekhiye agar wo usse ye rehta hai ki agar KYC wagera hota hai na jaise KYC wagera account.
Customer: Baki GST number aapke paas hai wo KYC ke liye sabse important KYC GST hai PAN number aapke paas hai aur kya chahiye.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Company private limited hai bina KYC ke paid team trade ban jayegi.
Executive: Nahi bank detail chaliye theek hai ek baar baat karta hu dekhta hu.
Customer: Ek baat khud hi bataiye na private team trade company hai private limited bina KYC ke ban jayegi.
Executive: Haan main aapko man gaya na sab main aapko mujhe aapko samajh mein aa gaya lekin isliye ye to IndiaMART bhi yahi kehti hai ki matlab account wagera detail wagera add karne ke liye taki in future kabhi kuch aisa ho.
Customer: In future cancel kara dega kuch bhi na plan cancel kara dega refund de dega pareshan.
Executive: Nahi usse do teen fayde hote hai jaise man lijiye matlab do teen company ka man.
Customer: Main aapki aapki sari cheez samajh gaya ki aapke paas koi paisa aayega usse claim bhi aa sakti hai kai sari cheeze jo aapko karke direct mere paas bhi aa sakti hai.
Executive: Haan kal ko aap account se.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul bilkul bilkul main samajh sakta hu cheezon ke liye. Lekin owner ne mana kar diya to sir main kya kar sakta hu batao.
Executive: Wahi na kal ko man lijiye account se agar aap renewal wagera karte hai to direct dikh jayega ki aapke account matlab aapke hi account se aaya hai to ye sara cheez isi wajah se ho rehta hai.
Customer: Main nahi kar raha hu main mana nahi aapne mana aapki baat delete kar dijiye aap bataiye.
Executive: Haan haan matlab khud sahi bata raha hu lekin main usme main kya kar sakta hu owner ke owner se response nahi hai to.
Executive: Haan nahi baat to sahi hai.
Customer: Haan owner ne.
Executive: Theek hai aur service wagera ka use wagera aap bhi karte hai sir ya phir aur koi karta hai.
Customer: Main karta hu sir janta hu.
Executive: Thoda sa usage abhi kam chal rahi thi to kuch matlab hai abhi do char time nahi nikal pa rahe hai.
Customer: Ke ke dino se iske upar check kahan se kare office ke andar maine abhi ek do login karke de rakha hai isme kya naam hai wo IndiaMART ka jo bank detail aa raha hai wo use hi nahi kar pa rahe pichle se teen char din se char panch din se.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Ye char panch din se show aa raha hai na ye sticker dwara hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: To wo use hi kya kare unka to aur bada plan lene ka tha 1 lakh something wala plan lene ka plan tha unka sir ka.
Executive: Sir ka.
Customer: Haan ji bada plan lene ka plan tha lekin aapki in cheezon pe jo faltu cheeze wo kar dete ho us cheez se thoda sa.
Executive: Kya kar sakte hai sir isme to sara hi hamara hi nuksan hai but wo hai ki company ka ye hai ki account details wagera add hona chahiye.
Customer: Ab main mana nahi kar raha hu sir ka bhi kuch reason hi hoga isliye nahi kar rahe honge. Pehle nahi nahi pehle bhi ek aapse baat chali pehle nahi thi pehle nahi li thi aapne itne bade bade package aapne check kiye to pehle account detail nahi di company ke account se paisa jata hai aapke paas mein bina account ke paisa gaya aapke paas.
Executive: Haan haan gaya hai aapke paas.
Customer: Theek. Lekin wo nahi karana chahte koi reason hoga unka personal ab uske liye main aapko force thodi na kar sakta hu guruji.
Executive: Nahi nahi wo unka bhi kuch reason hoga.
Customer: Haan haan nahi payment aapko payment kahan se di current account se di hai.
Executive: Hmm. Wo nahi karana chahte usme main kya kar sakta hu kyun.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul. Chaliye dekh lijiye hata dijiye na.
Executive: Haan iske pehle to aap na service wo matlab bada plan chala rahe the supplier.
Customer: Bada hi lena to wo chah raha tha ab ye jab ke dino se wo service use nahi kar pa raha hai office staff ne complaint kar di mere paas phone aaya phir aaj maine complaint kari yahan par customer care mein.
Executive: Chaliye iska solution mein. Iska solution mere paas dekhta hu ki matlab kya hai matlab kuch kya solution kar sakte hai hum theek hai main batata hu phir aapko theek hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai sir theek hai thank you thank you thank you thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to use service for days.

- Does not want to share bank details.

- Owner does not want to share bank details.



Resolution:

- Executive will check for a solution.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back with solution.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- bank details, service issue, account, kyc
